DOCNAME: FINDIK v. TURKEY AND OMER V. TURKEY
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicants , whose particulars are set out in the appendix , are NORP nationals and close relatives of ORG and PERSON Ömer Kartal , who disappeared in DATE . The applicants were represented before the ORG by PERSON , PERSON and PERSON PERSON , lawyers practising in the town of Silopi , near PERSON .

CARDINAL . At TIME on DATE PERSON and ORG , accompanied by their relative PERSON , left ORG and ORG after having paid a visit there on the occasion of New Year ’s Eve . Nothing has been heard from them since that date .
CARDINAL . On DATE the car in which the CARDINAL men had travelled DATE and which was owned by PERSON , was found abandoned on vacant land in Silopi .
CARDINAL . The DATE the family asked the authorities to find the missing men . The brother of PERSON alleged that the men might have been abducted .

CARDINAL . When the preliminary investigation to find the CARDINAL men did not yield any results , on DATE the Silopi prosecutor issued a continuous search order and asked the police to give him progress reports DATE .

CARDINAL . NORP In DATE the applicants claimed compensation from the ORG , pursuant to PERSON no . ORG Compensation of the Losses resulting from Terrorism , for the disappearance of their relatives . On DATE ORG rejected the case on account of the applicants’ failure to comply with a procedural rule . On DATE ORG rejected the appeal lodged by the applicants . ORG decision was served on the applicants on DATE .
